description: Defines an environment configuration class 'EnvConfig' for a Flutter application, which loads environment variables from a .env file using flutter_dotenv and provides access to configuration parameters such as API URLs, TURN server info, and a mock mode toggle.

classes.name: EnvConfig
classes.description: A class that encapsulates environment configuration parameters for the application.

methods.name: EnvConfig.fromDotEnv
methods.description: Static factory method that creates an EnvConfig instance by loading environment variables from a .env file.

methods.name: EnvConfig.hasSignaling
methods.description: Getter that indicates whether the signaling URL is set and non-empty.
